text: Harold "Hal" Douglas (born Harold Cohen; September 1, 1924 â€“ March 7, 2014) was an American voice actor. He was best known for performing thousands of voice-overs for movie trailers, television commercials, and stage plays. His career as lasted for sixty years.Bernstein, Adam (March 12, 2008).
